public class RootScape<D extends ScapeData>
extends org.ascape.model.Scape

Root scape that initialises and loads agents into a base microsimulation scape.

$Revision$

Oliver Mannion

Set up the microsimulation.

Parameters:
scapeDataCreator - scape data creator
prototypeAgent - required by Ascape
baseScapeName - name of the base scape
numIterations - number of iterations per run
numRuns - number of runs

startR

public ScapeRInterface startR(String rRunEndCommand,
                              boolean keepAllRunDFs)
Starts R on the base scape.

Uses the lowercase version of the base scape name as the dataframe symbol. When evaluating rRunEndCommand and commands during the creation of output datasets in ROutput and ROutputMultiRun, this symbol is searched for and replaced with the current run's dataframe name.

Uses "R startup file" as the preferences key to lookup the location of the R startup file.

Parameters:
rRunEndCommand - R command to run at the end of each run, or null.
keepAllRunDFs - flag to keep the dataframes from each run in R. This means creating each new dataframe with a unique name.
Returns:
scape R interface
